item.title: Who am I
item.description: About Myself Hi, internet wanderer. My name is Dheeto. I am an ex-pharmacist currently working as a software engineer in Bangkok, Thailand. You might wonder, “How come?” I ended up in software engineering. Well, let me explain it to you. First Few Years of My Career I graduated from pharmacy school in early 2020, the year that COVID-19 hit. The healthcare industry wasn’t affected that much, so I could still find a job pretty easily and worked as a laboratory technician for almost three years.
